metadata.title: CVE-2022-1983 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Incorrect authorization in GitLab EE affecting all versions from 10.7 priorto 14.10.5, 15.0 prior to 15.0.4, and 15.1 prior to 15.1.1, allowed anattacker already in possession of a valid Deploy Key or a Deploy Token tomisuse it from any location to access Container Registries even when IPaddress restrictions were configured.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'not maintainable').
